casebody.data:
Rockingham, )

Dec. 5. 1905. ( Rockingham County Light & Power Co. v. Batchelder & a. Petition, under chapter 195, Laws 1901, for the assessment of damages occasioned by the taking of the right to maintain a line of poles upon the defendants’ premises. The plaintiffs excepted to certain instructions given the jury. Transferred from the April term, 1905, of the superior court by Stone, J. Samuel W. Emery, for the plaintiffs. Page Bartlett, for the defendants. Young, J.

The plaintiffs have not attempted to sustain their exception in this court. The record does not appear to present any question of law which requires consideration.

Exception overruled.

All concurred.
